sn12.36:2.1: ‘Katamam jaramaranam, kassa ca panidam jaramaranan’ti iti va, bhikkhave, yo vadeyya, ‘annam jaramaranam, annassa ca panidam jaramaranan’ti iti va, bhikkhave, yo vadeyya, ubhayametam ekattham byanjanameva nanam.
sn12.36:2.2: ‘Tam jivam tam sariram’ iti va, bhikkhave, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso na hoti.
sn12.36:2.3: ‘Annam jivam annam sariram’ iti va, bhikkhave, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso na hoti.
sn12.36:2.4: Ete te, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathagato dhammam deseti:
sn12.36:3.10: katame sankhara, kassa ca panime sankharati iti va, bhikkhave, yo vadeyya, ‘anne sankhara annassa ca panime sankhara’ti iti va, bhikkhave, yo vadeyya, ubhayametam ekattham byanjanameva nanam.
sn12.36:3.11: ‘Tam jivam tam sariram’ iti va, bhikkhave, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso na hoti.
sn12.36:3.12: ‘Annam jivam annam sariram’ iti va, bhikkhave, ditthiya sati brahmacariyavaso na hoti.
sn12.36:3.13: Ete te, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathagato dhammam deseti:
sn12.36:4.1: Avijjaya tveva, bhikkhave, asesaviraganirodha yanissa tani visukayikani visevitani vipphanditani kanici kanici.
sn12.36:4.2: ‘Katamam jaramaranam, kassa ca panidam jaramaranam’ iti va, ‘annam jaramaranam, annassa ca panidam jaramaranam’ iti va, ‘tam jivam tam sariram’ iti va, ‘annam jivam, annam sariram’ iti va.
sn12.36:4.3: Sabbanissa tani pahinani bhavanti ucchinnamulani talavatthukatani anabhavankatani ayatim anuppadadhammani.
sn12.36:5.1: Avijjaya tveva, bhikkhave, asesaviraganirodha yanissa tani visukayikani visevitani vipphanditani kanici kanici.
sn12.36:5.11: ‘katame sankhara, kassa ca panime sankhara’ iti va, ‘anne sankhara, annassa ca panime sankhara’ iti va; ‘tam jivam tam sariram’ iti va, ‘annam jivam annam sariram’ iti va.
sn12.36:5.12: Sabbanissa tani pahinani bhavanti ucchinnamulani talavatthukatani anabhavankatani ayatim anuppadadhammani”ti.
